data.name: Bluebell
data.description: Mertensia virginica (common names Virginia bluebells,[1] Virginia cowslip,[2] lungwort oysterleaf, Roanoke bells) is a spring ephemeral plant in the Boraginaceae (borage) family with bell-shaped sky-blue flowers, native to eastern North America.

images.description: Mertensia virginica Virginia Bluebell seen in Brooklyn Botanic Garden
Virginia Bluebells along the Rocky River in Berea, OH. Photo by Geoffrey A. Landis
